creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
Methods paralleling java.util.logging.Logger.entering, .exiting and .throwing would be reasonable 
enhancements to LogMF.

Committed implementation in rev 917391.

Uncertain to ideal behavior when toString() of param or return value throws an exception.  Tests on Sun JDK 1.6's java.util.logging does not raise exception to the calling code.  Was unable to find any exception catching code in the Apache Harmony implementation of java.util.logging, but then didn't confirm that Harmony has same behavior.
creator: carnold@apache.org
